message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It has been designed with cutting-edge technology and offers unparalleled performance. Considering its value and quality, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,200,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope you'll find this proposal attractive.
Hello Alice, thank you for presenting this product. While I acknowledge its quality, the price point is a little high for me. I'd be willing to purchase it for $800,000.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your perspective and would like to come up with a mutually beneficial solution. In light of your offer, I propose a price of $950,000 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a reasonable profit while being more accessible to you.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $950,000 is closer, but still a bit high for my budget.  Would you consider $875,000?
I'm glad we're making progress, Bob. Considering your feedback, I propose a price of $900,000 for the product. This is our final offer before considering other potential buyers.
